channel.title: Comments on: Applying Kanban to IT Processes (Part 2)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Fabrice Aimetti
item.dc:creator: Fabrice Aimetti
item.content:encoded:
Hello Eli,

I have translated into french your second (great) post :
http://www.fabrice-aimetti.fr/dotclear/index.php?post/2011/07/08/Appliquer-Kanban-aux-processus-informatiques-2

Regards,
Fabrice

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Dadi, I've glanced through the article and they appear to be working now. Not sure why they would have stopped but please let us know if they continue to not show up for you.
item.content:encoded: Dadi, I’ve glanced through the article and they appear to be working now. Not sure why they would have stopped but please let us know if they continue to not show up for you.

item.title: By: Dadi
item.dc:creator: Dadi
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

None of your pictures come up for me?!?

Cheers,
Dadi.

item.title: By: Natas
item.dc:creator: Natas
item.description: I have never heard of Kanban before, this is really interesting. We also suffer from splitting attention and losing time as we switch back and forth between tasks.
item.content:encoded: I have never heard of Kanban before, this is really interesting. We also suffer from splitting attention and losing time as we switch back and forth between tasks.
